decks.notes: The primary focus of this Gruul Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm your opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. By playing a low mana curve and focusing on efficient card choices, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The synergy between cards like Monastery Swiftspear, Heartfire Hero, and Monstrous Rage allows for powerful burst damage and board control. Additionally, the inclusion of removal spells like Shock and protection spells like Snakeskin Veil help to maintain tempo and pressure your opponent. Overall, the deck aims to assert dominance early and close out games swiftly.

The main concept of this Jeskai Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle. By utilizing cards that provide early game pressure like Novice Inspector and Knight-Errant of Eos, as well as cards that can deal direct damage like Gleeful Demolition and Spyglass Siren, the deck aims to quickly chip away at the opponent's life total while maintaining a strong board presence. Resolute Reinforcements and Warden of the Inner Sky provide additional utility and flexibility, while Warleader's Call and Yotian Frontliner offer powerful late-game options to secure victory.

This deck focuses on fast and aggressive gameplay by using creatures with disruptive abilities and removal spells to control the board. The goal is to quickly build a threatening board presence while efficiently removing any threats from the opponent, ultimately overwhelming them with powerful creatures like Gix, Yawgmoth Praetor and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse. The deck also includes cards that provide additional value, like Faerie Mastermind and Mirrex, to maintain pressure on the opponent. Overall, the strategy revolves around utilizing efficient creatures and spells to outpace and outmuscle the opponent.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a swarm of low-cost creatures and utilizing support cards to buff them up and control the board. It aims to assert board dominance early on and maintain pressure through efficient creature plays and combat tricks. The inclusion of cards like Virtue of Loyalty, Lay Down Arms, and Caretaker's Talent helps to boost the power of the weenie creatures while disrupting the opponent's game plan. The deck's key strength lies in its ability to rapidly build a threatening board presence while controlling the pace of the game.

This Orzhov Control deck focuses on stalling the game and controlling the board with a mix of removal spells and creatures that disrupt opponents. The deck aims to build up a board presence with cards like Archangel Elspeth and The Eternal Wanderer. Sunfall and Virtue of Loyalty provide additional mana ramp and card advantage. Get Lost and Lay Down Arms help control the opponent's board while cards like Caretaker's Talent and Carrot Cake provide additional value. Kambal, Profiteering Mayor and Novice Inspector add disruption to the opponent's game plan. The deck's mana base includes Sunken Citadel, Fountainport, and Shadowy Backstreet to ensure consistent mana sources.

The main focus of this Orzhov Control deck is to establish control over the game by using removal spells and board wipes to deal with threats, while also utilizing card advantage and resource denial to outlast opponents. With a combination of powerful creatures like Archangel Elspeth and Serra Paragon, along with disruptive spells like Temporary Lockdown and Get Lost, the deck aims to slow down the opponent's game plan and eventually secure victory through attrition. The deck also includes mana fixing and card draw to ensure consistency and resilience throughout the match.

This deck focuses on playing aggressive red creatures and burn spells to deal damage quickly to the opponent. The main goal is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and efficient threats while using burn spells to remove any blockers or gain reach to close out the game. The deck utilizes a mix of low-cost creatures and direct damage spells to maintain pressure and maintain a fast pace throughout the game. Additionally, there are some resilient creatures like Witchstalker Frenzy and Squee, Dubious Monarch to provide additional threats and value in longer games.
